|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX8CLF2G18AC; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = 1866 |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;;;

|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VDSL2, VoIP |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2018 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07LG5NFXP |asin_country = DE |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad2modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/vodafone/vodafone_power_station}}
Modem: ADSL/ADSL2/VDSL2/35b/G.fast/G.inp :ONT: Optional with SFP port
===Models=== :;Vodafone Power Station Wi-Fi 6 *Models: [[SerComm SHG3060]] • ADSL Fibra Modem :• [[Vodafone Power Station Wi-Fi 6 (SHG3060)]]
:;Vodafone Power Station / Vox30 *Models: [[Technicolor THG3000]] • [[SerComm SHG3000]] :Both models share the same hardware and firmware.
*The [[Vodafone]] Vox30 has been marketed under different names, which are: :• Vodafone Power Station (SHG3000, distributed in Italy) :• Vodafone Gigabox (SHG3000, distributed in Ireland) :• Vodafone Wi-Fi Hub (THG3000, distributed in the UK)
:;Vodafone Station Revolution / Vox2.5 *Models: [[SerComm SHG2500]] • [[ADB AHG2500]]
*This Vox2.5 has been marketed with different names in some countries, like: :• Vodafone Station Revolution (AHG2500/HHG2500/SHG2500) :• Vodafone Connect Wi-Fi Router (HHG2500) :• Vodafone Router Avanzado (SHG2500) :• [[Vodafone EasyBox 804]] (SHG2500)
The Vodafone firmware image variant, its UI design and features set differ by country. :[[ADB AHG2500]] clone share the same board of [[ADB VV5820]] (“Fastweb Fibra Top”). :[[SerComm SHG2500]] clone share the same board of [[SerComm VD625]] (“Smart Modem TIM”)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
